commandPrefix.description: What character(s) to use to define the beginning of custom commands.

performanceMode.description:
Whether the addon should use simpler methods to run operations faster.
This comes with the drawback of more limited capabilities.

maxHistorySize.description: How many operations can be recorded in a player's history.

drawOutlines.description: Whether a player's outlines are drawn by default. Outlines include selections, brush influence and paste location

ticksToDeleteSession.description:
How long (in ticks) until a previously active builder's session gets deleted.
This includes their undo/redo history.

printToActionBar.description: Whether commands executed by items print their messages to the action bar or the chat.

wandItem.description: The default item used for marking selection wand.

navWandItem.description: The default item used for the navigation wand.

traceDistance.description: The distance the navigation wand, among other tools and commands, traces for a block of interest.

superPickaxeDrop.description: Whether blocks broken by the super pickaxe in "single" mode drop.

superPickaxeManyDrop.description: Whether blocks broken by the super pickaxe in "area" and "recursive" mode drop.

defaultChangeLimit.description: The default amount of blocks that can be "potentially" affected within a single operation.

maxChangeLimit.description:
The absolute change limit that can be set from the ;limit command.
Bypassed with "worldedit.limit.unlimited" permission.

asyncTimeBudget.description:
How long an async operation will run until giving Minecraft a chance to run.
The higher the value, the faster the operation, but the slower Minecraft takes to run.
